description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=3/3. Crawlers and Brawlers is a RPG descended from the 8bit classics. Become an adventurer and go on a fantastic journey through 11 epic procedural generated dungeons. Collect powerful loot to develop your character then brawl online with your friends on 12 different multiplayer maps.
description.short: Crawlers and Brawlers is a RPG descended from the 8bit classics. Become an adventurer and go on a fantastic journey through 11 epic procedural generated dungeons.
